rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0001
rows.name:
For a moment I really thought that
the chairman would jump. I was frozen
with fear.

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0002
rows.name:
He said he just wanted to take in the
view, but I think that must have been
a lie to keep me from worrying.

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I knew deep down, but we were all
taking too much from chairman, making
too many selfish demands on him.

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0004
rows.name: The burden must have gotten too great.

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0005
rows.name:
The chairman has done so much for
us - it's time for us to support him in
return.
